title: Journey through Japan
creator_contributor_role: Japan. National Tourist Organisation, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Japan - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Japan - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Rites and ceremonies - Japan
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/National characteristics, Japanese
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Rites and ceremonies - Japan
description: The kinship between humans and nature is shown in this film designed to inform on all aspects of Japanese life and the countryside during the four seasons of the year. We see the modern industrial Japan and the ancient traditional ways which are still evident in ceremonies, festivals, arts and crafts, buildings and rural areas.
